statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_records
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM patient_health_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patient_health_records WHERE diagnosis='Influenza' AND age < 50
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE age >= 40 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_info;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_personal_info ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_info;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM patient_medical_history JOIN patient_personal_info ON patient_medical_history.patient_id = patient_personal_info.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, symptom_name FROM patient_symptoms JOIN patient_personal_info ON patient_symptoms.patient_id = patient_personal_info.patient_id WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medical_history.date_recorded FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, symptoms.symptom_name, patient_symptoms.severity FROM patients JOIN patient_symptoms ON patients.patient_id = patient_symptoms.patient_id JOIN symptoms ON patient_symptoms.symptom_id = symptoms.symptom_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, COUNT(patient_symptoms.symptom_id) AS num_symptoms FROM patients JOIN patient_symptoms ON patients.patient_id = patient_symptoms.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_name HAVING num_symptoms > 2;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT test_name, result_value, timestamp FROM LabResults WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, MedicalHistory.date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization, COUNT(Appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabResults.test_name, LabResults.result_value FROM Patients JOIN LabResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabResults.patient_id WHERE LabResults.result_value > 100;
